company.name: Chopp.vn
company.description:
Chopp is an on-demand personal grocery shopping and delivery service that delivers groceries to your door in one hour. We know you have a busy lifestyle so we are here to cater to you on the go. With our convenient and easy-to-use mobile app, you can browse and shop anywhere, anytime.

We are more than just a grocery delivery company, Chopp is here to bring you world-class customer service and experience. Our professionally-trained ?Choppers? are working hard everyday (while still enjoying it!) to bring the safest and freshest groceries to you and your family.
